Class IntegerMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • IntegerMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class IntegerMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An integer matrix class represented by a 2-dimensional array.
    See Also:
